name: TV Shows Quiz | Name The Show | 10 Questions

questions.text: What show does a boy named Cody appear on?
questions.explanation:
"Suite Life of Zack and Cody".

	In real life he has a twin. The "Suite Life of Zack and Cody" first aired in 2005.

questions.text: What show did Will Smith play on?
questions.explanation:
"Fresh Prince of Bel Air".

	His real name is Willard Smith. Will and his wife Jada have a son name Jayden and a daughter named Willow. Will also has a son named Trey from his first marriage.

questions.text: What show does a girl named Maddie play on?
questions.correct: "The Suite Life of Zack and Cody"
questions.explanation:
"The Suite Life of Zack and Cody".

	Maddie's real name is Ashley Tisdale. She starred in "High School Musical".

"Good Times".

	JJ used to always say "dynOmite" on "Good Times". He guest starred on "George Lopez" as well.

questions.text: What show do people lose weight on?
questions.explanation:
"Biggest Loser".

	"Biggest Loser" has had 5 seasons as of March 2008. The current season as of April 2008 is "Biggest Loser Couples".

questions.text: The last season of "Good Times" was in 1989.
questions.explanation:
false.

	"Good Times'" last season was in 1979. This show starred James Walker.

questions.text: What show did Amanda Bynes play on?
questions.explanation:
"What I Like About You".

	She also played on "The Amanda Show". Amanda Bynes was 22 years old in 2008.

questions.text: Penny Proud is a character from "The Proud Family".
questions.explanation:
True.

	Penny's real name is Kyla Pratt. On "The Proud Family" Penny's grandma name was Suga Mama.

questions.text: Phylicia Rashad played on "The Fresh Prince of Bel Air".
questions.explanation:
False.

	She played on the "Cosby Show". Phylicia was born in 1948.

questions.text: What Disney show is Derek a character from?
questions.explanation:
"Life with Derek".

	Derek's real name is Michael Seater. In real life Micheal was 21 years old in 2008.
